title: Random Summoner Icon from Riot?
body: So I logged into league today to get a gift from riot...its awesome I just was wondering what it was for. It was the summoner icon I have on at the moment

replies.body: Thanks for the assist, Galacius!  Indeed, we had a few icons for the [Dark Star ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017)event.  Congrats.  :D

Hello again!

It turns out (a rioter responded to another post like this) that you had 33 kills in the dark star thresh event! There you go!

Hello Skye,

I am not a Rioter, but there was a Dark Star thresh event a few weeks ago. If you played a few of those it seems like that's where the icon comes from. I hope this helps!
